content:
# I have successfully crafted 1 stone furnace and now have 5 units of stone remaining in my inventory. 
# Next, I will place the stone furnace at the location of the iron ore patch and fuel it with wood to smelt the iron ore into iron plates.

# Let's place the stone furnace at the iron resource position and insert the necessary items to begin smelting.

furnace_position = iron_resource_position  # Using the position of the iron resource for the furnace placement
place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=furnace_position)  # Place the furnace
insert_item(Prototype.Wood, furnace_position, quantity=4)  # Fuel the furnace with wood
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace_position, quantity=10)  # Feed the furnace with iron ore

print(f"Furnace placed at {furnace_position}. Smelting iron ore into plates...")  # Indicating that smelting is in progress.
